name: The Adventures of The Alien Chef
name_original: The Adventures of The Alien Chef
description:
You play as an alien chef who needs to pick up groceries from Earth for the new episode of his cooking show. But as you arrive to Earth, you realize that the people there aren't as friendly.

Your aim is to pick up the groceries and escape without getting harmed. Good luck.

Install instructions

1. Download the file on your PC 
2. Extract the .rar file
3. Run the game
4. Enjoy!
